value.title: Meta-backed Hupo finds growth after pivot to AI sales coaching from mental wellness
value.content: Hupo, backed by Meta, pivoted from mental wellness to AI sales coaching for banks and insurers, and secured a $10M Series A led by DST Global

value.title: More than 100 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 — here they are
value.content: Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked down the VC-backed startups that became unicorns so far this year.

value.title: OpenAI buys tiny health records startup Torch for, reportedly, $100M
value.content: AI health records startup Torch will be using its tech for OpenAI's new ChatGPT Health, according to co-founder Ilya Abyzov.

value.title: Hands-on with Bee, Amazon’s latest AI wearable
value.content: We tried Amazon's new AI wearable Bee. It's not for pro users yet, but more features are expected this year.

value.title: Why Amazon bought Bee, an AI wearable
value.content: Amazon explains where its wearable Bee fits in and whether it will merge with Alexa.

value.title: Mark Zuckerberg says Meta is launching its own AI infrastructure initiative
value.content: Meta is ramping up its efforts to build out its AI capacity — Zuckerberg said the company intended to drastically expand its energy footprint in the coming years.

value.title: Anthropic announces Claude for Healthcare following OpenAI’s ChatGPT Health reveal
value.content: Anthropic's Claude for Healthcare is unveiled about a week after OpenAI announced its ChatGPT Health product.

value.title: Pebble founder says his new company is ‘not a startup’
value.content: Pebble's founder talks about how his new company is doing things differently.

value.title: Anthropic’s new Cowork tool offers Claude Code without the code
value.content: Built into the Claude Desktop app, Cowork lets users designate a specific folder where Claude can read or modify files, with further instructions given through the standard chat interface.

value.title: Trump’s EPA plans to ignore health effects of air pollution
value.content: The Trump administration plans to stop assigning value to human life when analyzing the costs and benefits of air pollution controls.

value.title: Amazon says 97% of its devices can support Alexa+
value.content: Amazon is counting on its Alexa footprint to help it gain traction in the consumer AI race.

value.title: Fintech firm Betterment confirms data breach after hackers send fake crypto scam notification to users
value.content: Hackers gained access to some Betterment customers’ personal information through a social engineering attack, then targeted some of them with a crypto-related phishing message.

value.title: Developers have made $550B on Apple’s App Store since 2008
value.content: Apple says its services had a "record-breaking year," as Apple TV, Apple Music, and Apple Pay also soared.

value.title: Google’s Gemini to power Apple’s AI features like Siri
value.content: Apple and Google have embarked on a non-exclusive, multi-year partnership that will involve Apple using Gemini models and Google cloud technology for future foundational models.

value.title: Paramount files lawsuit against Warner Bros. amidst controversial Netflix merger
value.content: As two major streaming platforms — Warner Bros. and Netflix — prepare for a merger, concerns continue to be voiced about the implications of the deal, which represents more consolidation in the media business.

value.title: A New Jersey lawsuit shows how hard it is to fight deepfake porn
value.content: A number of US laws have already banned deepfake pornography — most notably the Take It Down Act. But while specific users are clearly breaking those laws, it’s much harder to hold the entire platform accountable.

value.title: Netflix had a huge night at the 2026 Golden Globes with 7 wins
value.content: As Netflix gears up to acquire Warner Bros., the streaming giant took home 7 awards at the Golden Globes last night.

value.title: Luminar lines up $22 million bidder for its lidar business
value.content: The bid comes from Quantum Computing Inc., which already lined up to buy Luminar's semiconductor division. Luminar founder Austin Russell has also expressed interest.

value.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
value.content: Powell McCormick served as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

value.title: Harmattan AI raises $200M Series B led by Dassault Aviation, becomes defense unicorn
value.content: French defense tech company Harmattan AI is now valued at $1.4 billion after raising a $200 million Series B round led by Dassault Aviation, which is best known for making the Rafale fighter jet.
